28.Name: Defence? What Defence?
28.Description: Kill any Barrows Brother using only magical damage.

39.Name: Preparation Is Key
39.Description: Kill Bryophyta without suffering any poison damage.

40.Name: A Slow Death
40.Description: Kill Bryophyta with either poison or venom being the final source of damage.

37.Name: Protection from Moss
37.Description: Kill Bryophyta with the Protect from Magic prayer active.

41.Name: Fighting as Intended II
41.Description: Kill Bryophyta on a free to play world.

121.Name: Not So Great After All
121.Description: Finish off a Greater Demon with a demonbane weapon.

162.Name: King Black Dragon Novice
162.Description: Kill the King Black Dragon 10 times.

175.Name: Shayzien Protector
175.Description: Kill a Lizardman Shaman in Molch which has not dealt damage to anyone (excluding its Spawns).

398.Name: Into the Den of Giants
398.Description: Kill a Hill Giant, Moss Giant and Fire Giant in the Giant Cave within the Shayzien region.

134.Name: Fighting as Intended
134.Description: Kill Obor on a free to play world.

131.Name: Sleeping Giant
131.Description: Kill Obor whilst he is immobilized.

591.Name: One by one
591.Description: Kill one Titan at a time, without attacking the other.

594.Name: Elemental Company
594.Description: Kill the Royal Titans without attacking any elementals.

597.Name: Let them fight
597.Description: Kill the Royal Titans while having the Royal Titans kill a total of 10 elementals.

523.Name: Sit Rat
523.Description: Finish off Scurrius with a ratbane weapon in a private instance.

630.Name: Dry Cleaning
630.Description: Kill the Shellbane Gryphon after clearing its corrosive spit from your armour.

356.Name: Master of Buckets
356.Description: Extinguish at least 5 fires during a single Tempoross fight.

357.Name: Calm Before the Storm
357.Description: Repair either a mast or a totem pole.

360.Name: Fire in the Hole!
360.Description: Attack Tempoross from both sides by loading both cannons on both ships.

282.Name: Handyman
282.Description: Repair a brazier which has been destroyed by the Wintertodt.

285.Name: Cosy
285.Description: Subdue the Wintertodt with four pieces of warm equipment equipped.

281.Name: Mummy!
281.Description: Heal a pyromancer after they have fallen.

584.Name: Temotli Triumph
584.Description: Kill Amoxliatl using only glacial temotli as a weapon.

27.Name: Pray for Success
27.Description: Kill all six Barrows Brothers and loot the Barrows chest without taking any damage from any of the brothers.

26.Name: Can't Touch Me
26.Description: Kill Dharok, Verac, Torag and Guthan without letting them attack you with melee.

38.Name: Quick Cutter
38.Description: Kill all 3 of Bryophyta's growthlings within 3 seconds of the first one dying.

63.Name: Sorry, What Was That?
63.Description: Kill the Chaos Fanatic without anyone being hit by his explosion attack.

72.Name: Mage of the Ruins
72.Description: Kill the Crazy Archaeologist with only magical attacks.

73.Name: I'd Rather Not Learn
73.Description: Kill the Crazy Archaeologist without anyone being hit by his "Rain of Knowledge" attack.

204.Name: A Frozen King
204.Description: Kill Dagannoth Rex whilst he is immobilized.

79.Name: I'd Rather Be Illiterate
79.Description: Kill the Deranged Archaeologist without anyone being hit by his "Learn to Read" attack.

78.Name: Mage of the Swamp
78.Description: Kill the Deranged Archaeologist with only magical attacks.

182.Name: Avoiding Those Little Arms
182.Description: Kill the Giant Mole without her damaging anyone.

164.Name: Claw Clipper
164.Description: Kill the King Black Dragon with the Protect from Melee prayer activated.

166.Name: Antifire Protection
166.Description: Kill the King Black Dragon with an antifire potion active and an antidragon shield equipped.

163.Name: King Black Dragon Champion
163.Description: Kill the King Black Dragon 25 times.

165.Name: Hide Penetration
165.Description: Kill the King Black Dragon with a stab weapon.

528.Name: Lunar Triplet
528.Description: Open the Reward Chest after defeating all three Moons.

535.Name: Moons of Peril Speed-Trialist
535.Description: Defeat all three Moons in one run in under 8 minutes.

534.Name: Back to Our Roots
534.Description: Defeat all three Moons in one run by only attacking with a Dragon Scimitar.

399.Name: Sit Back and Relax
399.Description: Deal 100 damage to creatures using undead thralls.

133.Name: Squashing the Giant
133.Description: Kill Obor without taking any damage off prayer.

132.Name: Back to the Wall
132.Description: Kill Obor without being pushed back more than one square by his knockback attack.

598.Name: It takes too long
598.Description: Kill both Royal Titans while they are charging up their area attack. Both titans must die during the same charging phase.

210.Name: Newspaper Enthusiast
210.Description: Kill Sarachnis with a crush weapon.

525.Name: Efficient Pest Control
525.Description: Kill 6 Giant Rats within Scurrius' lair in 3 seconds.

524.Name: Perfect Scurrius
524.Description: Kill Scurrius in a private instance without taking damage from the following attacks: Tail Swipe and Falling Bricks. Pray correctly against the following attacks: Flying Fur and Bolts of Electricity.

628.Name: Shellbane Speedrunner
628.Description: Kill the Shellbane Gryphon 10 times within 12:30 minutes of entering the cave.

627.Name: Perfect Shellbane
627.Description: Kill the Shellbane Gryphon without taking damage.

223.Name: A Frozen Foe from the Past

48.Name: Demonbane Weaponry
48.Description: Kill Skotizo with a demonbane weapon equipped.

46.Name: Demonic Weakening
46.Description: Kill Skotizo with no altars active.

359.Name: The Lone Angler
359.Description: Subdue Tempoross alone without getting hit by any fires, torrents or waves.

574.Name: You're a wizard
574.Description: Kill the Hueycoatl using only earth spells.

283.Name: Can We Fix It?

284.Name: Leaving No One Behind
284.Description: Subdue the Wintertodt without any of the Pyromancers falling.

5.Name: Don't Whip Me
5.Description: Kill the Abyssal Sire without being hit by any external tentacles.

3.Name: They Grow Up Too Fast
3.Description: Kill the Abyssal Sire without letting any Scion mature.

7.Name: Don't Stop Moving
7.Description: Kill the Abyssal Sire without taking damage from any miasma pools.

581.Name: Amoxliatl Speed-Trialist
581.Description: Kill Amoxliatl in less than 1 minute.

586.Name: Kemo Makti

587.Name: Totally Shattered
587.Description: Kill Amoxliatl without any of her unstable ice shattering.

583.Name: Nagua Negation
583.Description: Kill Amoxliatl without taking any damage.

30.Name: Faithless Crypt Run
30.Description: Kill all six Barrows Brothers and loot the Barrows chest without ever having more than 0 prayer points.

29.Name: Just Like That
29.Description: Kill Karil using only damage dealt by special attacks.

60.Name: The Flincher
60.Description: Kill the Chaos Elemental without taking any damage from its attacks.

59.Name: Hoarder
59.Description: Kill the Chaos Elemental without it unequipping any of your items.

64.Name: Praying to the Gods
64.Description: Kill the Chaos Fanatic 10 times without drinking any potion which restores prayer or leaving the Wilderness.

213.Name: Commander Showdown
213.Description: Finish off Commander Zilyana while all of her bodyguards are dead.

18.Name: Ourg Freezer
18.Description: Kill General Graardor whilst he is immobilized.

20.Name: General Showdown
20.Description: Finish off General Graardor whilst all of his bodyguards are dead.

179.Name: Why Are You Running?
179.Description: Kill the Giant Mole without her burrowing more than 2 times.

181.Name: Whack-a-Mole
181.Description: Kill the Giant Mole within 10 seconds of her resurfacing.

86.Name: Granite Footwork
86.Description: Kill the Grotesque Guardians without taking damage from Dawn's rockfall attack.

84.Name: Don't Look at the Eclipse
84.Description: Kill the Grotesque Guardians without taking damage from Dusk's blinding attack.

85.Name: Prison Break
85.Description: Kill the Grotesque Guardians without taking damage from Dusk's prison attack.

87.Name: Heal No More
87.Description: Kill the Grotesque Guardians without letting Dawn receive any healing from her orbs.

88.Name: Static Awareness
88.Description: Kill the Grotesque Guardians without being hit by any lightning attacks.

124.Name: Hesporisn't
124.Description: Finish off Hespori with a special attack.

125.Name: Weed Whacker
125.Description: Kill all of Hesporis flowers within 5 seconds.

335.Name: Demonic Showdown
335.Description: Finish off K'ril Tsutsaroth whilst all of his bodyguards are dead.

339.Name: Demonbane Weaponry II
339.Description: Finish off K'ril Tsutsaroth with a demonbane weapon.

334.Name: Yarr No More
334.Description: Receive kill-credit for K'ril Tsutsaroth without him using his special attack.

159.Name: Chitin Penetrator
159.Description: Kill the Kalphite Queen while her defence was last lowered by you.

167.Name: Who Is the King Now?
167.Description: Kill The King Black Dragon 10 times in a private instance without leaving the instance.

169.Name: Unnecessary Optimisation
169.Description: Kill the Kraken after killing all four tentacles.

170.Name: Krakan't Hurt Me
170.Description: Kill the Kraken 25 times in a private instance without leaving the room.

12.Name: Airborne Showdown
12.Description: Finish off Kree'arra whilst all of his bodyguards are dead.

533.Name: Betrayal

536.Name: Moons of Peril Speed-Chaser
536.Description: Defeat all three Moons in one run in under 6 minutes.

532.Name: Fortified
532.Description: Defeat a Moon without consuming any supplies.

537.Description: Defeat 30 Moons of Peril bosses without leaving the dungeon.

531.Description: Defeat all the Moons in one run while only taking damage from regular attacks.

526.Name: The Clone Zone
526.Description: Defeat the Eclipse moon by only attacking its clones.

588.Name: Perfect Royal Titans
588.Description: Kill the Royal Titans without getting hit by any avoidable damage. This includes: Melee attacks, Explosions from the ice or fire elemental, Icicle or fire spawn damage, and Ice or fire pulse attacks.

592.Name: Royal Titan Speed-Runner
592.Description: Kill the Royal Titans in less than 1:30 minutes.

593.Name: Titan Killer
593.Description: Kill the Royal Titans 15 times without anyone leaving the instance. If a player joins the fight, the current streak will be reset to 0. If a player leaves the fight, the task will be failed and a new instance will need to be created.

595.Name: I need room
595.Description: Kill the Royal Titans while extinguishing all fires and melting all icicles before they dissipate naturally.

209.Name: Inspect Repellent
209.Description: Kill Sarachnis without her dealing damage to anyone.

208.Name: Ready to Pounce
208.Description: Kill Sarachnis without her using her range attack twice in a row.

220.Name: I Can't Reach That
220.Description: Kill Scorpia without taking any damage from her.

221.Name: Guardians No More
221.Description: Kill Scorpia without killing her guardians.

629.Name: Shellbane Survivor
629.Description: Kill the Shellbane Gryphon 25 times without leaving the cave.

631.Name: Featherweight Fighter
631.Description: Kill the Shellbane Gryphon 5 times without leaving the cave, while wearing gear weighing less than 40kg.

355.Name: Dress Like You Mean It
355.Description: Subdue Tempoross while wearing any variation of the angler outfit.

358.Name: Why Cook?
358.Description: Subdue Tempoross, getting rewarded with 10 reward permits from a single Tempoross fight.

575.Name: I'm your son

572.Name: Pillar Lover
572.Description: Kill the Hueycoatl whilst it is vulnerable.

462.Name: Novice Tomb Looter
462.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut in Entry mode (or above) 25 times.

286.Name: Why Fletch?
286.Description: Subdue the Wintertodt after earning 3000 or more points.

6.Name: Demonic Rebound
6.Description: Use the Vengeance spell to reflect the damage from the Abyssal Sire's explosion back to him.

4.Name: Respiratory Runner
4.Description: Kill the Abyssal Sire after only stunning him once.

8.Name: Perfect Sire
8.Description: Kill the Abyssal Sire without taking damage from the external tentacles, miasma pools, explosion or damage from the Abyssal Sire without praying the appropriate protection prayer.

585.Name: Without Ralos' Light
585.Description: Kill Amoxliatl without losing any prayer points.

582.Name: Amoxliatl Speed-Chaser
582.Description: Kill Amoxliatl in less than 30 seconds.

564.Name: Relaxxor
564.Description: Kill Araxxor after destroying six eggs.

56.Name: Anti-Bite Mechanics
56.Description: Kill Cerberus without taking any melee damage.

303.Name: Together We'll Fall
303.Description: Kill the Vanguards within 10 seconds of the first one dying.

312.Name: Undying Raid Team
312.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric raid without anyone dying.

316.Name: Cryo No More

302.Name: Perfectly Balanced
302.Description: Kill the Vanguards without them resetting their health.

321.Name: Kill It with Fire

299.Name: Chambers of Xeric Veteran

320.Name: Blizzard Dodger

308.Description: Kill the Abyssal Portal without forcing Vespula to land.

307.Description: Kill the Muttadile without letting her or her baby recover hitpoints from the meat tree.

292.Name: Dust Seeker
292.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric Challenge mode raid in the target time.

216.Name: Reminisce
216.Description: Kill Commander Zilyana in a private instance with melee only.

68.Name: Finding the Weak Spot
68.Description: Finish off the Corporeal Beast with a Halberd special attack.

67.Name: Hot on Your Feet
67.Description: Kill the Corporeal Beast without anyone killing the dark core or taking damage from the dark core.

101.Name: 3, 2, 1 - Mage
101.Description: Kill the Corrupted Hunllef without taking damage off prayer.

116.Name: Wolf Puncher
116.Description: Kill the Crystalline Hunllef without making more than one attuned weapon.

114.Name: Egniol Diet
114.Description: Kill the Crystalline Hunllef without making an egniol potion within the Gauntlet.

115.Name: Crystalline Warrior
115.Description: Kill the Crystalline Hunllef with a full set of perfected armour equipped.

111.Name: 3, 2, 1 - Range
111.Description: Kill the Crystalline Hunllef without taking damage off prayer.

200.Name: From One King to Another

199.Description: Kill Dagannoth Prime whilst under attack by Dagannoth Supreme and Dagannoth Rex.

203.Name: Death to the Warrior King
203.Description: Kill Dagannoth Rex whilst under attack by Dagannoth Supreme and Dagannoth Prime.

236.Name: Rapid Succession
236.Description: Kill all three Dagannoth Kings within 9 seconds of the first one.

235.Name: Death to the Archer King
235.Description: Kill Dagannoth Supreme whilst under attack by Dagannoth Prime and Dagannoth Rex.

75.Name: Hitting Them Where It Hurts
75.Description: Finish off a Demonic Gorilla with a demonbane weapon.

610.Name: Doom Adept

621.Name: Doom Crawler
621.Description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl level 1 in less than 30 seconds.

613.Name: Exposed Doom
613.Description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl during its Melee charge phase.

512.Name: Duke Sucellus Speed-Trialist
512.Description: Kill Duke Sucellus in less than 1:00 minutes without a slayer task.

548.Name: I was here first!

81.Description: Kill Galvek in less than 3 minutes.

19.Name: Ourg Freezer II

127.Description: Kill the Hespori in less than 48 seconds.

337.Description: Kill K'ril Tsutsaroth in a private instance without taking any of his melee hits.

336.Description: Defeat K'ril Tsutsaroth in a private instance using only demonbane spells.

160.Description: Kill the Kalphite Queen by using the Vengeance spell as the finishing blow.

161.Name: Prayer Smasher

171.Name: Ten-tacles
171.Description: Kill the Kraken 50 times in a private instance without leaving the room.

503.Name: Leviathan Speed-Trialist
503.Description: Kill the Leviathan in less than 1:50 without a slayer task.

527.Name: High Hitter
527.Description: Defeat a Moon before they start their second special attack.

473.Name: Can't Escape
473.Description: Kill the Phantom Muspah without running.

482.Name: Versatile Drainer
482.Description: Drain the Phantom Muspah's Prayer with three different sources in one kill.

475.Name: Phantom Muspah Speed-Trialist
475.Description: Kill the Phantom Muspah in less than 3 minutes without a slayer task.

596.Name: No time to pray

49.Name: Up for the Challenge
49.Description: Kill Skotizo without equipping a demonbane weapon.

47.Name: Demon Evasion
47.Description: Kill Skotizo without taking any damage.

571.Name: Perfect Hueycoatl
571.Description: Kill the Hueycoatl perfectly 5 times without leaving. To get a perfect kill, you must not take any avoidable damage from the Hueycoatl's lightning attack, tail slam attack or off-prayer projectile attacks.

191.Name: Nightmare (Solo) Speed-Trialist
191.Description: Defeat the Nightmare (Solo) in less than 23 minutes.

194.Name: Nightmare (5-Scale) Speed-Trialist
194.Description: Defeat the Nightmare (5-scale) in less than 5 minutes.

187.Name: Explosion!
187.Description: Kill two Husks at the same time.

237.Name: Theatre of Blood Veteran
237.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood 25 times.

389.Name: Chally Time
389.Description: Defeat the Pestilent Bloat in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode by using a halberd special attack as your final attack.

392.Name: Don't Look at Me!
392.Description: Kill Xarpus in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without him reflecting any damage to anyone.

395.Name: Pass It On
395.Description: In the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode, successfully pass on the green ball to a team mate.

391.Name: Just To Be Safe
391.Description: Defeat Sotetseg in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode after having split the big ball with your entire team. This must be done with a group size of at least 2.

387.Name: Appropriate Tools
387.Description: Defeat the Pestilent Bloat in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode with everyone having a salve amulet equipped.

386.Description: Defeat the Maiden of Sugadinti in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without letting any bloodspawn live for longer than 10 seconds.

394.Name: Attack, Step, Wait
394.Description: Survive Verzik Vitur's second phase in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without anyone getting bounced by Verzik.

390.Name: Nylocas, On the Rocks
390.Description: In the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode, freeze any 4 Nylocas with a single Ice Barrage spell.

393.Name: No-Pillar
393.Description: Survive Verzik Vitur's pillar phase in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without losing a single pillar.

388.Name: They Won't Expect This
388.Description: In the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode, enter the Pestilent Bloat room from the opposite side.

262.Name: Hazard Prevention
262.Description: Kill the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil without it hitting anyone.

263.Name: Spec'd Out
263.Description: Kill the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil using only special attacks.

261.Name: Thermonuclear Veteran
261.Description: Kill the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil 20 times.

430.Name: Hardcore Raiders
430.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut in a group of two or more without anyone dying.

458.Name: Down Do Specs
458.Description: Defeat the Wardens after staggering the boss a maximum of twice during phase two, without dying yourself.

425.Name: Helpful spirit who?
425.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut without using any supplies from the Helpful Spirit and without anyone dying. Honey locusts are included in this restriction.

468.Name: Tomb Explorer
468.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut once.

432.Name: Perfect Het
432.Description: Complete the Het room without taking any damage from the light beam and orbs. You must destroy the core after one exposure.

431.Name: Hardcore Tombs
431.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut solo without dying.

449.Name: Dropped the ball
449.Description: Defeat Akkha without dropping any materialising orbs and without dying yourself.

451.Name: No skipping allowed
451.Description: Defeat Ba-Ba after only attacking the non-weakened boulders in the rolling boulder phase, without dying yourself. The Boulderdash invocation must be activated.

438.Name: Perfect Crondis
438.Description: Complete the Crondis room without letting a crocodile get to the tree, without anyone losing water from their container and in under one minute.

435.Name: Perfect Apmeken
435.Description: Complete the Apmeken room in a group of two or more, without anyone allowing any dangers to trigger, standing in venom or being hit by a volatile baboon. You must complete this room in less than three minutes.

452.Name: I'm in a rush
452.Description: Defeat Ba-Ba after destroying four or fewer rolling boulders in total without dying yourself.

463.Name: Novice Tomb Raider
463.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut in Entry mode (or above) 50 times.

469.Name: Expert Tomb Explorer
469.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (Expert mode) once.

553.Name: Two Times the Torment
553.Description: Kill two Tormented Demons within 2 seconds.

555.Name: Rapid Reload
555.Description: Hit three Tormented Demons within 3 seconds using a ballista or a crossbow.

552.Name: Through Fire and Flames
552.Description: Kill a Tormented Demon whilst their shield is inactive.

367.Name: Facing Jad Head-on III
367.Description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's second challenge with only melee.

364.Name: TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Speed-Trialist
364.Description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's first challenge in less than 45 seconds.

341.Name: Half-Way There
341.Description: Kill a Jal-Zek within the Inferno.

153.Name: Facing Jad Head-on
153.Description: Complete the Fight Caves with only melee.

149.Name: A Near Miss!
149.Description: Complete the Fight Caves after surviving a hit from TzTok-Jad without praying.

485.Name: Vardorvis Speed-Trialist
485.Description: Kill Vardorvis in less than 1:15 minutes without a slayer task.

273.Name: Stick 'em With the Pointy End
273.Description: Kill Vorkath using melee weapons only.

271.Name: Zombie Destroyer
271.Description: Kill Vorkath's zombified spawn without using crumble undead.

501.Name: Tentacular
501.Description: Kill the Whisperer whilst only being on the Arceuus spellbook.

494.Name: Whisperer Speed-Trialist
494.Description: Kill the Whisperer in less than 3:00 without a slayer task.

601.Name: Yama Speed-Trialist
601.Description: Defeat Yama in an average time of under 3:38 over your last four kills.

607.Name: Back so soon?
607.Description: Defeat Yama without the judge being attacked with the wrong style and without taking more than one instance of damage each time you are exiled from the arena.

330.Name: Team Player
330.Description: Receive imbued tephra from a golem.

331.Name: The Spurned Hero
331.Description: Kill Zalcano as the player who has dealt the most damage to her.

329.Name: Perfect Zalcano

230.Name: Zulrah Speed-Trialist
230.Description: Kill Zulrah in less than 1 minute 20 seconds, without a slayer task.

227.Name: Snake Rebound

144.Name: Alchemical Speed-Chaser
144.Description: Kill the Alchemical Hydra in less than 1 minute 45 seconds.

138.Name: Lightning Lure
138.Description: Kill the Alchemical Hydra without being hit by the lightning attack.

142.Name: Alcleanical Hydra
142.Description: Kill the Alchemical Hydra without taking any damage.

140.Name: Mixing Correctly
140.Description: Kill the Alchemical Hydra without empowering it.

146.Name: Working Overtime
146.Description: Kill the Alchemical Hydra 15 times without leaving the room.

139.Name: Don't Flame Me
139.Description: Kill the Alchemical Hydra without being hit by the flame wall attack.

141.Name: The Flame Skipper

137.Name: Unrequired Antipoisons
137.Description: Kill the Alchemical Hydra without being hit by the acid pool attack.

563.Name: Let it seep in

566.Name: Araxyte Betrayal

561.Name: Perfect Araxxor
561.Description: Kill Araxxor perfectly, without taking damage from Araxxor's Mage & Range attacks, melee attack off prayer, araxyte minions damage, or damage from acid pools.

53.Name: Arooo No More
53.Description: Kill Cerberus without any of the Summoned Souls being spawned.

324.Name: Chambers of Xeric (5-Scale) Speed-Chaser
324.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric (5-scale) in less than 15 minutes.

322.Name: Chambers of Xeric (Solo) Speed-Chaser
322.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric (Solo) in less than 21 minutes.

304.Name: No Time for Death
304.Description: Clear the Tightrope room without Killing any Deathly Mages or Deathly Rangers.

300.Name: Chambers of Xeric Master
300.Description: Complete the Chambers of Xeric 75 times.

310.Name: Anvil No More
310.Description: Kill Tekton before he returns to his anvil for a second time after the fight begins.

315.Name: Playing with Lasers
315.Description: Clear the Crystal Crabs room without wasting an orb after the first crystal has been activated.

319.Name: Blind Spot
319.Description: Kill Tekton without taking any damage.

313.Name: Undying Raider
313.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric solo raid without dying.

317.Name: Perfect Olm (Solo)
317.Description: Kill the Great Olm in a solo raid without taking damage from any of the following: Teleport portals, Fire Walls, Healing pools, Crystal Bombs, Crystal Burst or Prayer Orbs. You also cannot let his claws regenerate or take damage from the same acid pool back to back.

306.Name: A Not So Special Lizard
306.Description: Kill the Great Olm in a solo raid without letting him use any of the following special attacks in his second to last phase: Crystal Burst, Lightning Walls, Teleportation Portals or left-hand autohealing.

305.Name: Putting It Olm on the Line
305.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric solo raid with more than 40,000 points.

309.Name: Stop Drop and Roll
309.Description: Kill Vasa Nistirio before he performs his teleport attack for the second time.

326.Name: Chambers of Xeric (Trio) Speed-Chaser
326.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric (Trio) in less than 16 minutes and 30 seconds.

318.Name: Perfect Olm (Trio)
318.Description: Kill the Great Olm in a trio raid without any team member taking damage from any of the following: Teleport portals, Fire Walls, Healing pools, Crystal Bombs, Crystal Burst or Prayer Orbs. You also cannot let his claws regenerate or take damage from the same acid pool back to back.

293.Name: Chambers of Xeric: CM (Solo) Speed-Chaser
293.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode (Solo) in less than 45 minutes.

288.Name: Chambers of Xeric: CM Master
288.Description: Complete the Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode 10 times.

295.Name: Chambers of Xeric: CM (5-Scale) Speed-Chaser
295.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode (5-scale) in less than 30 minutes.

297.Name: Chambers of Xeric: CM (Trio) Speed-Chaser
297.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode (Trio) in less than 35 minutes.

291.Name: Immortal Raider
291.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric Challenge mode (Solo) raid without dying.

290.Name: Immortal Raid Team
290.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge mode raid without anyone dying.

215.Name: Moving Collateral
215.Description: Kill Commander Zilyana in a private instance without attacking her directly.

102.Name: Perfect Corrupted Hunllef
102.Description: Kill the Corrupted Hunllef without taking damage from: Tornadoes, Damaging Floor or Stomp Attacks. Also, do not take damage off prayer and do not attack the Corrupted Hunllef with the wrong weapon.

105.Name: Corrupted Warrior
105.Description: Kill the Corrupted Hunllef with a full set of perfected corrupted armour equipped.

107.Name: Corrupted Gauntlet Speed-Chaser
107.Description: Complete a Corrupted Gauntlet in less than 7 minutes and 30 seconds.

103.Name: Defence Doesn't Matter II
103.Description: Kill the Corrupted Hunllef without making any armour within the Corrupted Gauntlet.

113.Name: Defence Doesn't Matter
113.Description: Kill the Crystalline Hunllef without making any armour within the Gauntlet.

117.Name: Gauntlet Speed-Chaser
117.Description: Complete the Gauntlet in less than 5 minutes.

112.Name: Perfect Crystalline Hunllef
112.Description: Kill the Crystalline Hunllef without taking damage from: Tornadoes, Damaging Floor or Stomp Attacks. Also, do not take damage off prayer and do not attack the Crystalline Hunllef with the wrong weapon.

615.Name: Grub Patrol
615.Description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl levels 1-8 without ever letting a grub be absorbed.

620.Name: Mine's Better
620.Description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl levels 1-8 whilst always wearing a shield.

614.Name: Mokhaiotl Drift
614.Description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl at level 8 or above before he finishes the first burrow phase.

611.Name: Doom Veteran
611.Description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl at delve level 8.

622.Name: Doom Chaser
622.Description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl levels 1-8 in less than 10:00.

513.Name: Duke Sucellus Speed-Chaser
513.Description: Kill Duke Sucellus in less than 50 seconds without a slayer task.

518.Name: Perfect Duke Sucellus
518.Description: Kill Duke Sucellus without taking any avoidable damage 5 times without leaving.

519.Name: Cold Feet
519.Description: Kill Duke Sucellus without taking any avoidable damage, whilst also never running.

549.Name: Colosseum Speed-Chaser
549.Description: Complete the Colosseum with a total time of 28:00 or less.

544.Name: Showboating
544.Description: Defeat Sol Heredit after using Fortis Salute to the north, east, south and west of the arena while he is below 10% hitpoints.

546.Name: One-off
546.Description: Complete Wave 11 with either 'Red Flag', 'Dynamic Duo', or 'Doom II' active.

540.Name: I Brought Mine Too
540.Description: Defeat Sol Heredit using only a Spear, Hasta or Halberd.

91.Name: Perfect Grotesque Guardians II
91.Description: Kill the Grotesque Guardians 5 times in a row without leaving the instance, whilst completing the Perfect Grotesque Guardians task every time.

96.Name: ... 'til Dawn
96.Description: Kill the Grotesque Guardians 20 times without leaving the instance.

93.Name: Grotesque Guardians Speed-Chaser
93.Description: Kill the Grotesque Guardians in less than 1:40 minutes.

128.Name: Hespori Speed-Chaser
128.Description: Kill the Hespori in less than 36 seconds.

172.Name: One Hundred Tentacles
172.Description: Kill the Kraken 100 times in a private instance without leaving the room.

11.Name: Collateral Damage
11.Description: Kill Kree'arra in a private instance without ever attacking him directly.

13.Name: Swoop No More
13.Description: Kill Kree'arra in a private instance without taking any melee damage from the boss or his bodyguards.

504.Name: Leviathan Speed-Chaser
504.Description: Kill the Leviathan in less than 1:25 without a slayer task.

509.Name: Perfect Leviathan
509.Description: Kill the Leviathan perfectly 5 times without leaving.

510.Name: Serpentine Solo
510.Description: Kill the Leviathan without stunning the boss more than once.

416.Name: Nex Trio

420.Name: Shadows Move...
420.Description: Kill Nex without anyone being hit by the Shadow Smash attack.

414.Name: Contain this!
414.Description: Kill Nex without anyone taking damage from any Ice special attack.

413.Name: A siphon will solve this
413.Description: Kill Nex without letting her heal from her Blood Siphon special attack.

415.Name: There is no escape!
415.Description: Kill Nex without anyone being hit by the Smoke Dash special attack.

483.Name: Walk Straight Pray True
483.Description: Kill the Phantom Muspah without taking any avoidable damage.

476.Name: Phantom Muspah Speed-Chaser
476.Description: Kill the Phantom Muspah in less than 2 minutes without a slayer task.

474.Name: Essence Farmer
474.Description: Kill the Phantom Muspah 10 times in one trip.

472.Name: More than just a ranged weapon
472.Description: Kill the Phantom Muspah by only dealing damage to it with a salamander.

481.Name: Space is Tight
481.Description: Kill the Phantom Muspah whilst it is surrounded by spikes.

406.Name: Crush Hour
406.Description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare while killing every parasite and husk in one hit.

404.Name: Phosani's Speedchaser
404.Description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare within 7 minutes and 30 seconds

408.Name: Dreamland Express
408.Description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare without a sleepwalker reaching her during her desperation phase.

407.Name: I Would Simply React
407.Description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare without allowing your prayer to be disabled.

50.Name: Precise Positioning
50.Description: Kill Skotizo with the final source of damage being a Chinchompa explosion.

577.Description: Kill the Hueycoatl in 2:30 with five or fewer players.

573.Name: Is it a bird?
573.Description: Kill the Hueycoatl using only dragonbane weaponry.

192.Name: Nightmare (Solo) Speed-Chaser
192.Description: Defeat the Nightmare (Solo) in less than 19 minutes.

195.Name: Nightmare (5-Scale) Speed-Chaser
195.Description: Defeat the Nightmare (5-scale) in less than 4 minutes.

188.Name: Perfect Nightmare
188.Description: Kill the Nightmare without any player taking damage from the following attacks: Nightmare rifts, an un-cured parasite explosion, Corpse flowers or the Nightmare's Surge. Also, no player can take damage off prayer or have their attacks slowed by the Nightmare spores.

251.Name: Can You Dance?
251.Description: Kill Xarpus without anyone in the team using a ranged or magic weapon.

241.Name: Pop It
241.Description: Kill Verzik without any Nylocas being frozen and without anyone taking damage from the Nylocas.

259.Name: Theatre (5-Scale) Speed-Chaser
259.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood (5-scale) in less than 16 minutes.

245.Name: Perfect Bloat
245.Description: Kill the Pestilent Bloat without anyone in the team taking damage from the following sources: Pestilent flies, Falling body parts or The Pestilent Bloats stomp attack.

246.Name: Perfect Nylocas
246.Description: Kill the Nylocas Vasilias without anyone in the team attacking any Nylocas with the wrong attack style, without letting a pillar collapse and without getting hit by any of the Nylocas Vasilias attacks whilst off prayer.

257.Name: Theatre (4-Scale) Speed-Chaser
257.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood (4-scale) in less than 17 minutes.

248.Name: Perfect Xarpus
248.Description: Kill Xarpus without anyone in the team taking any damage from Xarpus' attacks and without letting an exhumed heal Xarpus more than twice.

247.Name: Perfect Sotetseg
247.Description: Kill Sotetseg without anyone in the team stepping on the wrong tile in the maze, without getting hit by the tornado and without taking any damage from Sotetseg's attacks whilst off prayer.

253.Name: Back in My Day...
253.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood without any member of the team equipping a Scythe of Vitur.

249.Name: Perfect Verzik
249.Description: Defeat Verzik Vitur without anyone in the team taking damage from Verzik Vitur's attacks other than her spider form's correctly prayed against regular magical and ranged attacks.

244.Name: Perfect Maiden
244.Description: Kill The Maiden of Sugadinti without anyone in the team taking damage from the following sources: Blood Spawn projectiles and Blood Spawn trails. Also, without taking damage off prayer and without letting any of the Nylocas Matomenos heal The Maiden.

250.Name: Can't Drain This
250.Description: Kill The Maiden of Sugadinti without anyone in the team losing any prayer points.

255.Name: Theatre (Trio) Speed-Chaser
255.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood (Trio) in less than 20 minutes.

242.Name: A Timely Snack
242.Description: Kill Sotetseg after surviving at least 3 ball attacks without sharing the damage and without anyone dying throughout the fight.

240.Name: Two-Down
240.Description: Kill the Pestilent Bloat before he shuts down for the third time.

238.Name: Theatre of Blood Master
238.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood 75 times.

396.Name: Theatre of Blood: SM Speed-Chaser
396.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode in less than 17 minutes.

381.Name: Hard Mode? Completed It
381.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode within the challenge time.

424.Name: You are not prepared
424.Description: Complete a full Tombs of Amascut raid only using supplies given inside the tomb and without anyone dying.

467.Name: Tomb Raider
467.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut 50 times.

459.Name: Better get movin'
459.Description: Defeat Elidinis' Warden in phase three of the Wardens fight with 'Aerial Assault', 'Stay vigilant' and 'Insanity' invocations activated and without dying yourself.

466.Name: Tomb Looter
466.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut 25 times.

428.Name: Chompington
428.Description: Defeat Zebak using only melee attacks and without dying yourself.

421.Name: Tombs Speed Runner
421.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (normal) within 18 mins at any group size.

444.Name: Perfect Wardens
444.Description: Defeat The Wardens in a group of two or more, without anyone taking avoidable damage from the following: Warden attacks, obelisk attacks, lightning attacks in phase three, skull attack in phase three, Demi god attacks in phase three. You must have all Wardens invocations activated.

433.Name: Perfect Akkha
433.Description: Complete Akkha in a group of two or more, without anyone taking any damage from the following: Akkha's attacks off-prayer, Akkha's special attacks (orbs, memory, detonate), exploding shadow timers, orbs in the enrage phase or attacking Akkha with the wrong style. You must have all Akkha invocations activated.

436.Name: Perfect Ba-Ba
436.Description: Defeat Ba-Ba in a group of two or more, without anyone taking any damage from the following: Ba-Ba's Attacks off-prayer, Ba-Ba's slam, rolling boulders, rubble attack or falling rocks. No sarcophagi may be opened. You must have all Ba-Ba invocations activated.

439.Name: Perfect Zebak
439.Description: Defeat Zebak without anyone taking any damage from: poison, Zebak's basic attacks off-prayer, blood spawns and waves. You also must not push more than two jugs on the roar attack during the fight (you may destroy stationary ones). You must have all Zebak invocations activated.

441.Name: Perfect Scabaras
441.Description: Complete the Scabaras room in less than a minute without anyone taking any damage from puzzles.

442.Name: Perfect Kephri
442.Description: Defeat Kephri in a group of two or more, without anyone taking any damage from the following: egg explosions, Kephri's attacks, Exploding Scarabs, Bodyguards, dung attacks. No eggs may hatch throughout the fight.

429.Name: Fancy feet
429.Description: Complete phase three of The Wardens in a group of two or more, using only melee attacks and without dying yourself. The 'Insanity' invocation must be activated.

470.Name: Expert Tomb Looter
470.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (Expert mode) 25 times.

447.Name: Something of an expert myself
447.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut raid at level 350 or above without anyone dying.

455.Name: Rockin' around the croc
455.Description: Defeat Zebak with all Zebak invocations activated and the path levelled up to at least four, without dying yourself.

457.Name: All out of medics
457.Description: Defeat Kephri without letting her heal above 25% after the first down. The 'Medic' invocation must be activated. You must do this without dying yourself.

460.Name: Warden't you believe it
460.Description: Defeat the Wardens with all Wardens invocations activated, at expert level and without dying yourself.

426.Name: Resourceful Raider
426.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut with the "On a diet" and "Dehydration" invocations activated and without anyone dying.

453.Name: Ba-Bananza
453.Description: Defeat Ba-Ba with all Ba-Ba invocations activated and the path levelled up to at least four, without dying yourself.

427.Name: But... Damage
427.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut without anyone in your party wearing or holding any equipment at tier 75 or above.

456.Name: Doesn't bug me
456.Description: Defeat Kephri with all Kephri invocations activated and the path levelled up to at least four, without dying yourself.

554.Name: Three Times the Thrashing
554.Description: Kill three Tormented Demons within 3 seconds.

369.Name: Supplies? Who Needs 'em?
369.Description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's third challenge without having anything in your inventory.

368.Name: Facing Jad Head-on IV
368.Description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's fourth challenge with only melee.

371.Description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's third challenge while using a different attack style for each JalTok-Jad.

365.Description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's third challenge in less than 3 minutes.

346.Name: Nibblers, Begone!
346.Description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without letting a pillar fall before wave 67.

155.Description: Complete the Fight Caves in less than 30 minutes.

150.Description: Complete the Fight caves without letting any of the Yt-MejKot heal.

493.Description: Kill Vardorvis with gear worth 2m or less in total.

272.Description: Kill Vorkath 5 times without taking any damage from his special attacks and without leaving his area.

276.Name: Vorkath Speed-Chaser
276.Description: Kill Vorkath in less than 1 minute and 15 seconds.

495.Description: Kill the Whisperer in less than 2:25 without a slayer task.

500.Name: Perfect Whisperer
500.Description: Kill the Whisperer without taking avoidable damage 5 times without leaving.

604.Description: Defeat Yama without anybody healing using anything other than plain pizza and without anybody drinking any potions.

605.Name: Shadow dancer
605.Description: Defeat Yama without getting hit by shadows and without being more than one tile away from the center of his shadow crash attack.

602.Name: Yama Speed-Chaser
602.Description: Defeat Yama in an average time of under 3:00 over your last four kills.

231.Name: Zulrah Speed-Chaser
231.Description: Kill Zulrah in less than 1 minute, without a slayer task.

229.Name: Perfect Zulrah

145.Description: Kill the Alchemical Hydra in less than 1 minute 20 seconds.

143.Name: No Pressure

562.Name: Perfect Araxxor 2
562.Description: Kill Araxxor perfectly, without hitting it during the enrage phase.

565.Name: Swimming in Venom

325.Name: Chambers of Xeric (5-Scale) Speed-Runner

323.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric (Solo) in less than 17 minutes.

327.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric (Trio) in less than 14 minutes and 30 seconds.

301.Name: Chambers of Xeric Grandmaster
301.Description: Complete the Chambers of Xeric 150 times.

294.Name: Chambers of Xeric: CM (Solo) Speed-Runner
294.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode (Solo) in less than 38 minutes and 30 seconds.

296.Name: Chambers of Xeric: CM (5-Scale) Speed-Runner
296.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode (5-scale) in less than 25 minutes.

298.Description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode (Trio) in less than 27 minutes.

108.Description: Complete a Corrupted Gauntlet in less than 6 minutes and 30 seconds.

118.Description: Complete the Gauntlet in less than 4 minutes.

619.Description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl levels 1-8 without equipping a demonbane weapon.

550.Description: Complete the Colosseum with a total time of 24:00 or less.

541.Name: Slow Dancing in the Sand

543.Name: Perfect Footwork

23.Name: Ourg Killer
23.Description: Kill General Graardor 15 times in a private instance without leaving the room.

21.Name: Defence Matters
21.Description: Kill General Graardor 2 times consecutively in a private instance without taking any damage from his bodyguards.

22.Name: Keep Away
22.Description: Kill General Graardor in a private instance without taking any damage from the boss or bodyguards.

94.Name: Grotesque Guardians Speed-Runner
94.Description: Kill the Grotesque Guardians in less than 1:20 minutes.

340.Name: Ash Collector
340.Description: Kill K'ril Tsutsaroth 20 times in a private instance without leaving the room.

338.Name: Demon Whisperer
338.Description: Kill K'ril Tsutsaroth in a private instance without ever being hit by his bodyguards.

15.Name: Feather Hunter
15.Description: Kill Kree'arra 30 times in a private instance without leaving the room.

14.Name: The Worst Ranged Weapon
14.Description: Kill Kree'arra by only dealing damage to him with a salamander.

505.Name: Leviathan Speed-Runner
505.Description: Kill the Leviathan in less than 1:10 without a slayer task.

511.Name: Unconventional

417.Name: Nex Duo

419.Name: Perfect Nex
419.Description: Kill Nex whilst completing the requirements for "There is no escape", "Shadows move", "A siphon will solve this", and "Contain this!"

418.Name: I should see a doctor
418.Description: Kill Nex whilst a player is coughing.

484.Name: Phantom Muspah Manipulator
484.Description: Kill the Phantom Muspah whilst completing Walk Straight Pray True, Space is Tight & Can't Escape.

477.Description: Kill the Phantom Muspah in less than 1 minute and 30 seconds without a slayer task.

403.Name: Perfect Phosani's Nightmare
403.Description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare while only taking damage from husks, power blasts and weakened Parasites. Also, without having your attacks slowed by the Nightmare Spores or letting a Sleepwalker reach Phosani's Nightmare.

409.Name: Can't Wake Up
409.Description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare 5 times in a row without leaving Phosani's Dream.

578.Name: Hueycoatl Speed-Runner
578.Description: Kill the Hueycoatl in 2:30 with three or fewer players.

196.Name: Nightmare (5-Scale) Speed-Runner
196.Description: Defeat the Nightmare (5-scale) in less than 3:30 minutes.

193.Description: Defeat the Nightmare (Solo) in less than 16 minutes.

190.Name: A Long Trip

256.Name: Theatre (Trio) Speed-Runner
256.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood (Trio) in less than 17 minutes and 30 seconds.

258.Name: Theatre (4-Scale) Speed-Runner
258.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood (4-scale) in less than 15 minutes.

252.Name: Morytania Only

260.Name: Theatre (5-Scale) Speed-Runner
260.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood (5-scale) in less than 14 minutes and 15 seconds.

254.Name: Theatre (Duo) Speed-Runner
254.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood (Duo) in less than 26 minutes.

243.Name: Perfect Theatre
243.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood without anyone dying through any means and whilst everyone in the team completes the following Combat Achievement tasks in a single run: "Perfect Maiden", "Perfect Bloat", "Perfect Nylocas", "Perfect Sotetseg", "Perfect Xarpus" and "Perfect Verzik".

239.Name: Theatre of Blood Grandmaster
239.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood 150 times.

377.Name: Nylo Sniper
377.Description: Defeat Verzik Vitur's in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without anyone in your team causing a Nylocas to explode by getting too close.

373.Name: Personal Space
373.Description: Defeat the Pestilent Bloat in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode with at least 3 people in the room, without anyone in your team standing on top of each other.

384.Name: Theatre: HM (5-Scale) Speed-Runner
384.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode (5-scale) with an overall time of less than 19 minutes.

382.Name: Theatre: HM (Trio) Speed-Runner
382.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode (Trio) with an overall time of less than 23 minutes.

383.Name: Theatre: HM (4-Scale) Speed-Runner
383.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode (4-scale) with an overall time of less than 21 minutes.

380.Name: Pack Like a Yak
380.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode within the challenge time, with no deaths and without anyone buying anything from a supply chest.

372.Name: Stop Right There!
372.Description: Defeat the Maiden of Sugadinti in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without letting blood spawns create more than 15 blood trails.

374.Name: Royal Affairs
374.Description: In the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode, complete the Nylocas room without ever letting the Nylocas Prinkipas change styles.

376.Name: Harder Mode II
376.Description: Defeat Xarpus in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode after letting the exhumeds heal him to full health and without anyone in the team taking any damage.

379.Name: Harder Mode III
379.Description: Defeat Verzik Vitur in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without anyone attacking her with a melee weapon during her third phase.

378.Name: Team Work Makes the Dream Work
378.Description: When Verzik Vitur in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode uses her yellow power blast attack while the tornadoes are active, have everyone get through the attack without taking damage. This cannot be completed with one player alive

385.Name: Theatre of Blood: HM Grandmaster
385.Description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode 50 times.

375.Name: Harder Mode I
375.Description: Defeat Sotetseg in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without anyone sharing the ball with anyone, without anyone dying, and without anyone taking damage from any of its other attacks or stepping on the wrong tile in the maze.

454.Name: All Praise Zebak
454.Description: Defeat Zebak without losing a single prayer point. You must also meet the conditions of the 'Rockin' Around The Croc' achievement.

437.Name: Perfection of Apmeken
437.Description: Complete 'Perfect Apmeken' and 'Perfect Ba-Ba' in a single run of the Tombs of Amascut.

440.Name: Perfection of Crondis
440.Description: Complete 'Perfect Crondis' and 'Perfect Zebak' in a single run of the Tombs of Amascut.

434.Name: Perfection of Het
434.Description: Complete 'Perfect Het' and 'Perfect Akkha' in a single run of the Tombs of Amascut.

446.Name: Amascut's Remnant
446.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut at raid level 500 or above without anyone dying.

448.Name: Maybe I'm the boss.
448.Description: Complete a Tombs of Amascut raid with every single boss invocation activated and without anyone dying.

423.Name: Tombs Speed Runner III
423.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (expert) within 18 mins in a group of 8.

450.Name: Akkhan't Do it
450.Description: Defeat Akkha with all Akkha invocations activated and the path levelled up to at least four, without dying yourself.

471.Name: Expert Tomb Raider
471.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (Expert mode) 50 times.

422.Name: Tombs Speed Runner II
422.Description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (expert) within 20 mins at any group size.

443.Name: Perfection of Scabaras
443.Description: Complete 'Perfect Scabaras' and 'Perfect Kephri' in a single run of Tombs of Amascut.

445.Name: Insanity
445.Description: Complete 'Perfect Wardens' at expert or above.

370.Name: It Wasn't a Fluke
370.Description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's fifth and sixth challenges back to back without failing.

366.Name: TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Speed-Runner
366.Description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's fifth challenge in less than 5 minutes.

345.Name: No Luck Required
345.Description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without being attacked by TzKal-Zuk and without taking damage from a JalTok-Jad.

351.Name: Jad? What Are You Doing Here?
351.Description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without killing the JalTok-Jad which spawns during wave 69.

349.Name: Nibbler Chaser
349.Description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without using any magic spells during any wave in the Inferno.

344.Name: Playing with Jads
344.Description: Complete wave 68 of the Inferno within 30 seconds of the first JalTok-Jad dying.

347.Name: Wasn't Even Close
347.Description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without letting your hitpoints fall below 50 during any wave in the Inferno.

343.Name: The Floor Is Lava
343.Description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without letting Jal-ImKot dig during any wave in the Inferno.

352.Name: Inferno Speed-Runner
352.Description: Complete the Inferno in less than 65 minutes.

350.Name: Facing Jad Head-on II
350.Description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without equipping any range or mage weapons before wave 69.

348.Name: Budget Setup
348.Description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without equipping a Twisted Bow within the Inferno.

156.Name: Fight Caves Speed-Runner
156.Description: Complete the Fight Caves in less than 26 minutes and 30 seconds.

151.Name: Denying the Healers II
151.Description: Complete the Fight Caves without TzTok-Jad being healed by a Yt-HurKot.

154.Name: No Time for a Drink
154.Description: Complete the Fight Caves without losing any prayer points.

492.Name: Axe Enthusiast
492.Description: Kill Vardorvis after surviving for 3 minutes of Vardorvis' max speed, and never leaving the centre 25 tiles.

487.Name: Vardorvis Speed-Runner
487.Description: Kill Vardorvis in less than 0:55 without a slayer task.

275.Name: The Fremennik Way
275.Description: Kill Vorkath with only your fists.

277.Name: Vorkath Speed-Runner
277.Description: Kill Vorkath in less than 54 seconds.

274.Name: Faithless Encounter
274.Description: Kill Vorkath without losing any prayer points.

502.Name: Dark Memories
502.Description: Kill the Whisperer whilst spending less than 6 seconds in the pre-enrage shadow realm.

496.Name: Whisperer Speed-Runner
496.Description: Kill the Whisperer in less than 2:05 without a slayer task.

608.Name: Contract Choreographer
608.Description: Defeat Yama whilst completing 'Shadow Dancer', 'Fire Fighter', 'Back so soon?' and without taking any other avoidable damage.

603.Name: Yama Speed-Runner
603.Description: Defeat Yama in an average time of under 2:34 over your last four kills.

609.Name: Contractually Unbound
609.Description: Defeat Yama under the elevated conditions of one of his non-standard contracts.

232.Name: Zulrah Speed-Runner
232.Description: Kill Zulrah in less than 54 seconds, without a slayer task.
